channel.title: My Podcast of how to make Tessellations!
channel.description: This will teach you how to make a tessellation using my favorite method, the slice method.This is my favorite method because it is the first one I learned to use and I think it is the easiest.

item.title: Over all Tessellations...
item.description: Tessellations are easy to make, but however it is hard to make a good one. I think anyone can make a tessellation but only some can make a good one. You will never know if you never try. So try to make a tessellation and find out if you have a talent for making tessellations.
